game.s_dis: Subway Surfers: Hawaii takes the endless runner action to a tropical island setting with lava rivers, shipwrecks, and jungles, playable online unblocked with new characters, boards, and collectibles.
game.l_dis:
Subway Surfers: Hawaii â€“ Dash Through the Tropical Islands

Subway Surfers: Hawaii immerses players in a tropical Hawaiian environment. Run, jump, and slide along jungle and lava-themed tracks, dodging trains, barriers, and collecting coins, Tiki masks, and power-ups.

What is Subway Surfers: Hawaii?

This edition is part of the World Tour series, featuring Hawaiian-themed subway tracks, unique characters like Jake and Tricky, special boards like the Ukulele and Tiki boards, and collectible Tiki masks for Weekly Hunts.

How to Play Subway Surfers: Hawaii?

  • Swipe Controls: Swipe up to jump, down to roll, left/right to switch lanes.
  • Collect Coins & Tiki Masks: Gather coins, Tiki masks, and other collectibles to unlock Weekly Hunt rewards like hoverboards and keys.
  • Dodge Obstacles: Avoid trains, lava rivers, shipwrecks, and jungle hazards while maintaining your run.
  • Use Power-Ups: Activate magnets, jetpacks, and hoverboards to extend your run and maximize your score.

Why Play Subway Surfers: Hawaii Unblocked?

Experience the beautiful Hawaiian islands in Subway Surfers: Hawaii online without restrictions, unlock new characters, boards, and themed collectibles while exploring tropical scenery.

Key Features

  • Hawaiian Environment: Explore lush jungles, volcanic rivers, and tropical beaches.
  • Exclusive Characters & Boards: Play as Jake and Tricky, unlock the Ukulele and Tiki boards.
  • Endless Runner Gameplay: Classic swipe-based controls with tropical island challenges.
  • Special Collectibles: Collect Tiki masks for Weekly Hunt rewards.
  • Unblocked Online: Play instantly in your browser anywhere.

Master Hawaii's Subway Tracks!

Run, jump, and slide through Subway Surfers: Hawaii to beat obstacles, collect rewards, and enjoy the vibrant tropical environment!
